_sText:
Improved nav file, special thanks to chizbone who did it.


Cs_mount is here again!! A MUCH Better version of my map cs_mount!

CS_MOUNT2008
---------------------------
A Whole new look - improved textures and includes HDR lighting.
30 spawnpoints
4 Hostages
Secret "room"
Buyzone
And lots of props.


Terrorists start from the upstairs or the basement. The hostages are upstairs and basement. CT:s spawn at outside. It isn't very big map - but even funnier with a small group. It's designed for small games and just for fun. The hostages may be a little grumpy.

DOWNLOAD NOW! YOU HAVE ONLY ONE LIFE ;)

Oh, almost forgot: Rate it!
